DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate visual acuity quality vision participant undergo cataract surgery Hoya model 751 intra-ocular lens compare visual result common monofocal lens use .
DOC.brief_title: Visual Quality Following Aspheric Intraocular Lens ( IOL ) Implantation - Comparative Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Senile cataract Patient identify candidate cataract surgery IOL implantation Willing sign inform consent document approve Ethical Committee Willing complete require test exams per protocol Amblyopia History evidence ocular disease may affect visual acuity Previous ocular surgery , include refraction surgery Ocular anomaly ( e.g . microphthalmos , kerataconous ) Subjects great 1.0 D corneal astigmatism Subjects experience intraoperative complication could affect postoperative IOL centration tilt
